mapper.insert: insert into QRTZ_SCHEDULER_STATE (SCHED_NAME, INSTANCE_NAME, LAST_CHECKIN_TIME, CHECKIN_INTERVAL) values (#{schedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instanceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastCheckinTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkinInterval,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select SCHED_NAME, INSTANCE_NAME, LAST_CHECKIN_TIME, CHECKIN_INTERVAL from QRTZ_SCHEDULER_STATE
